game.title: Geometry Dash
game.description: Geometry Dash is a rhythm-based platformer game where you jump, fly, and flip your way through dangerous passages and spiky obstacles. Simple one-touch gameplay with catchy music and colorful visuals. Challenge yourself with increasingly difficult levels, create your own levels with the level editor, and share them with the online community.

achievements.name: Trophies Coming Soon
achievements.description: Trophies for this game will be added in the future
